biotools.summary: Predictive Assignment of Linear Secondary Structure Elements is a software that delineates secondary structure elements from protein Cα coordinates and specifically addresses the requirements of vector-based protein similarity searches. Our program identifies two types of secondary structures: helix and β-strand, typically those that can be well approximated by vectors.

bioschemas.name: PALSSE
